description: [``botocore``] This release includes model updates and enhanced SDK documentation for union fields in automated reasoning policy components. Added docs cover policy definitions, mutations (add/update for rules/types/variables), build assets, workflow sources, test results, and tag exception handling.
[``botocore``] Remove SigV4 auth requirement for GetTokensFromRefreshToken
[``botocore``] Adds support for Wait and Save feature in service-managed fleets

[``botocore``] This release adds AvailabilityZoneId support for CreateVolume, DescribeVolume, LaunchTemplates, RunInstances, DescribeInstances, CreateDefaultSubnet, SpotInstances, and CreateDefaultSubnet APIs.
[``botocore``] Update for general availability of Amazon Elastic VMware Service (EVS).
[``botocore``] Doc-only update for Lambda that updates the maximum payload size for response streaming invocations to 200 MB.
[``botocore``] Add RowAxisDisplayOptions and ColumnAxisDisplayOptions to HeatMapConfiguration, add Actions to PluginVisual, increase limit for CalculatedFields list
[``botocore``] Added support for managing user background session for applications
